name: Whale-watching Boat
description:
Story telling: As the captain of the Whale-watching Boat, you could control the routes sailing in the Arctic and click the Marine life to get their information for your Whale watching log.On your journey, you will appreciate gorgeous auroras, encounter with Marine life randomly. Don’t forget control sailing route and the shield to avoid sharks and icebergs.If sharks are too fierce, you can use torpedoes to scare them off!

Key Words: ASMR, Simulation Game, travel, cure and sleep aid

As a student, I often need to watch the ASMR videos to sleep, it can release my stress and give me a positive mood to help me sleep well. Therefore, I really want to make a game about ASMR. This vacation, because of the pandemic, we needed to stay at home. I applied the visa to Norway, But I can’t go there because I am afraid of lockdown and the virus. So that I have the Idea to mix the Norway trip and ASMR together so that players can appreciate gorgeous Aurora , marine organism like whales and hear their sounds like they just stay with us.
